summary: Casablanca is Morocco's biggest city and main economic hub. With a population of over 3.7 million, it's also the largest in the Maghreb region. Located on the Atlantic coast, it's known for its busy port, which is one of Africa's largest. Casablanca is a major financial center and home to many important businesses, including the third-largest stock exchange in Africa. The city is also a key industrial area, attracting many large companies.
title: Casablanca
